CustomField.formula: BLANKVALUE(TEXT(CCMI__Status_Override__c), CASE(CCMI__Minimum_Task_Status__c, 2, 'Completed', 1, 'In Progress', CASE(CCMI__Maximum_Task_Status__c, -1, 'On Hold', 0, 'Not Started', 'In Progress' ) ))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The overall status of the project as calculated from the Tasks.
CustomField.label: Status
